subject: College Athletics
Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The interest in college recruiting has boomed the past five years. It has turned more high school players into stars as they deal with calls from not only coaches all over the country, but reporters as well.
snippet: The interest in college recruiting has boomed the past five years. It has turned more high school players into stars as they deal with calls from not only coaches all over the country, but reporters as well.
